item.description:
We are members of Zoo New England (Franklin Park Zoo and Stone Zoo) and want to bring our friends! Let's check out Franklin Park Zoo on Wednesday, which is supposed to be a gorgeous day. There are picnic tables and green space throughout, so Elsa and I will have a picnic lunch when we're done looking at the animals.

Our membership allows me to bring 3 child guests (over age 2) and 1 adult. Adult admission is $17, so our adult guest spot is first come first served. If the spot is claimed but you still want to come, see if your local library offers a discount pass.
item.name: Let's Go to the Zoo!
